languages.text: "Вольного Торговца не единожды сопровождала в странствиях {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}спутница-ксенос{/d}. И пускай Патент позволяет санкционировать некоторых особей, что это, если не подтверждение лояльности рода фон Валанциус к врагам Человечества?"

traits.locale_text: "Вольного Торговца не единожды сопровождала в странствиях спутница-ксенос. И пускай Патент позволяет санкционировать некоторых особей, что это, если не подтверждение лояльности рода фон Валанциус к врагам Человечества?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"
languages.original_text: "Вольного Торговца не единожды сопровождала в странствиях {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}спутница-ксенос{/d}. И пускай Патент позволяет санкционировать некоторых особей, что это, если не подтверждение лояльности рода фон Валанциус к врагам Человечества?"

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

languages.text: « {Mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a souvent été {mf|flanqué|flanquée} d'une {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}compagnie xénos{/d}. Et même si la lettre de marque permet de cautionner des spécimens individuels, n'est-ce pas là la confirmation de la loyauté de la maison von Valancius envers les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: « {Mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} était souvent {mf|flanqué|flanquée} d'une compagnie xénos. Et même si la lettre de marque permet de cautionner des spécimens individuels, n'est-ce pas là la confirmation de la loyauté de la maison von Valancius envers les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这位行商浪人身边时常有{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}异形同伴陪伴{/d}。尽管根据贸易授状赋予的权力，行商浪人有权携带合法异形，但这不恰恰证明了冯·瓦兰修斯家族对人类之敌效忠吗？”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: “这位行商浪人身边时常有异形同伴陪伴。尽管根据贸易许可证赋予的权力，行商浪人有权携带合法异形，但这不正是证明了冯·瓦兰修斯家族对人类之敌效忠吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者は、しばしば{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}異種族の仲間{/d}を伴っていた。通商許可証はそれを個別の例として認可はしていたが、これがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の人類の敵に対する忠誠の証でなくて何だろうか？」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者は、しばしば{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}異種族の仲間{/d}を伴っていた。通商許可証はそれを個別の例として認可はしていたが、これがフォン・ヴァランシウス家の人類の敵に対する忠誠の証でなくて何だろうか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} wurde oft von einem {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}Xenos{/d} begleitet. Und obwohl der Handelsbrief es gestattet, Einzelne zu sanktionieren, was ist das außer einer Zurschaustellung der Loyalität der Familie von Valancius gegenüber den Feinden der Menschheit?"
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Der {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} wurde oft von einem Xenos begleitet. Und obwohl der Handelsbrief es gestattet, Einzelne zu sanktionieren, was ist das außer einer Zurschaustellung der Loyalität der Familie von Valancius gegenüber den Feinden der Menschheit?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente frecuentó la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}compañía de una xenos{/d}. Y si bien la Patente de Comercio autoriza al portador a disponer legalmente de los servicios de especímenes individuales, ¿acaso no confirma esto que la familia Von Valancius es leal a los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente frecuentó la compañía de una xenos. Y si bien la Patente de Comercio autoriza al portador a disponer legalmente de los servicios de especímenes individuales, ¿acaso no confirma esto que la familia Von Valancius es leal a los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, maiyetinde sık sık {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}zeno bulundurmuştur{/d}. Ticari Ruhsatnamesi her ne kadar farklı türlerden tekil varlıklara koruma sağlamaya müsaade etse de bu, von Valancius ailesinin İnsanlığın düşmanlarına olan sadakatinin göstergesi değildir de nedir?"
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has often been accompanied by a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_YrlietComp}xenos companion{/d}. And though the Warrant of Trade does allow one to grant sanction to individual specimens, what is this if not a confirmation of the von Valancius family's loyalty to the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir maiyetinde sık sık zeno bulundurdu ve Ticaret Ruhsatnamesi her ne kadar farklı türlerden tekil varlıklara koruma sağlamaya müsaade etse de bu, von Valancius ailesinin İnsanlığın düşmanlarına olan sadakatinin göstergesi değildir de nedir?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
